title: The Perceived Weight Stigma Scale and Weight Self-Stigma Questionnaire: Rasch analysis, confirmatory factor analysis, and network analysis among Chinese adolescents
content:
Publication date: November 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 236

Author(s): Daniel Kwasi Ahorsu, Chao-Ying Chen, I-Hua Chen, Amir H. Pakpour, Nadia Bevan, Jung-Sheng Chen, Xue Lian Wang, Po-Jui Ko, Mark D. Griffiths, Chung-Ying Lin
